Hello,
I encounter similar issue. I see it's long time, after it was reported, but I would really appreciate if you still remember some more details:

1. what Eclipse were you using? (fresh download from www.eclipse.org/downloads, or custom)
2. was it always like this? eg. right after install, or maybe after some updates, or with certain workspace
3. is there anything special about your hardware, eg. is it amd64, or dual-core?
4. did this happend with the only one installation of Eclipse, or with all of them?


Looks like there is couple of somehow related bugs, that are still NEW:
https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=161893
https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=110166
https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=98773
https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=76449
https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=42292
It was a one-time issue, didn't occurred again.
